content: I'm thinking of incorporating some strength training exercises to target my core muscles, as I've read that having a strong core can help improve my running efficiency and reduce my risk of injury. I already have my Omron 10 Series Wireless blood pressure monitor to track my blood pressure, and I've been using my Garmin Forerunner 245 Music to track my runs. Do you have any recommendations for core exercises that I can do at home or at the gym?
